name: gitdoc
description: Automatically commit/push/pull changes on save, so you can edit a Git repo like a multi-file, versioned document.

gitdoc.autoCommitDelay.description: Controls the delay in ms after which any changes are automatically committed. Only applies when `GitDoc: Enabled` is set to `true`.

gitdoc.autoPull.description: Specifies whether to automatically pull changes from the current remote.

gitdoc.autoPullDelay.description: Controls the delay in ms after which any commits are automatically pulled. Only applies when `GitDoc: Auto Pull` is set to `afterDelay`.

gitdoc.autoPush.description: Specifies whether to automatically push your changes to the current remote.

gitdoc.autoPushDelay.description: Controls the delay in ms after which any commits are automatically pushed. Only applies when `GitDoc: Auto Push` is set to `afterDelay`.

gitdoc.commitMessageFormat.markdownDescription: Specifies the date/time format string (using Luxon) to use when generating auto-commit messages. Views [the docs](https://moment.github.io/luxon/#/formatting?id=table-of-tokens) for more details.

gitdoc.commitValidationLevel.description: Specifies whether to validate that a file is free of problems, before attempting to commit changes to it.

gitdoc.commitOnClose.description: Specifies whether to automatically commit changes when you close VS Code.

gitdoc.enabled.description: Specifies whether to automatically create a commit each time you save a file.

gitdoc.filePattern.description: Specifies a glob that indicates the specific files that should be automatically committed.

gitdoc.pullOnOpen.description: Specifies whether to automatically pull remote changes when you open a repo.

gitdoc.pushMode.description: Specifies how changes should be pushed after they're committed. This setting only applies when auto-pushing is enabled.

gitdoc.timeZone.markdownDescription: Specifies the timezone (as a [tz database name](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones)) that commit message dates should be offset to. Defaults to UTC.
